title: Tamperfinder
description: TamperFinder is an advanced power monitoring and theft detection system designed to safeguard the electricity infrastructure. It identifies unauthorized consumption, detects tampering activities, and ensures the integrity of power delivery through real-time tracking and alerts. Built with cutting-edge IoT technology and intelligent sensors, TamperFinder helps utility companies, industries, and governments to drastically reduce revenue loss caused by power theft.The system offers a smart dashboard for monitoring incidents, reporting thefts, and maintaining the overall health of the electricity network.
role: Support in the updation of pages
Custom plugin integration
features: Custom WordPress Theme Development
Responsive and Mobile-First Design
Admin Panel with Custom Post Types

title: Clams Automation Pvt Ltd Website
tagline: Responsive WordPress Site for Smart Automation Solutions
description: Clams Automation Pvt Ltd is a leading provider of smart home and industrial automation systems. We built a fully custom WordPress site using WPBakery Page Builder and Slider Revolution to showcase their services—Smart Lightings, Smart Mirrors, Automated Pet Feeding Systems, and more. Advanced Custom Fields powers custom service blocks, a dynamic portfolio gallery, and integrated contact forms. The site is SEO-optimized, performance-tuned, and fully responsive across devices, giving visitors a modern, seamless experience of Clams’ cutting-edge solutions.
role: Full Stack WordPress Developer
features: Custom WP theme with WPBakery layouts
Interactive services blocks (ACF-powered)
Dynamic portfolio & testimonials gallery
Contact forms with AJAX validation
Slider Revolution hero banners
SEO optimization & performance tuning
Fully responsive design

title: Biverah
tagline: Embrace Pure Poise at Biverah Hotel & Suites
description: Biverah Hotel & Suites is a 4-star hotel located in Trivandrum. I contributed to the development of its professional and elegant website which showcases the hotel’s amenities, room types, dining options, conference facilities, and more. The site emphasizes user experience with intuitive navigation and responsive design for seamless access across all devices.
role: Designed and developed the entire front-end structure from scratch
Wrote clean, well-structured, and semantic HTML and CSS
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and responsive design
Focused on delivering a smooth, visually appealing user experience
features: Multi-page static website built using HTML5, CSS3, and vanilla JavaScript
Fully responsive layout that adapts seamlessly across mobile, tablet, and desktop devices
Custom-designed About Us, Rooms, Dining, Conference, and Gallery pages
Embedded high-quality images and detailed descriptions to create an immersive experience
Optimized for fast loading and user-friendly navigation

title: Sabarigiri International School
description: Sabarigiri International School is a CBSE-affiliated institution in Trivandrum. I worked on the complete development of its dynamic website using HTML, CSS, and PHP with the CodeIgniter framework. The site delivers important information about the school, academics, admissions, facilities, and more while maintaining a clean and structured design.
role: Built the front-end using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create an intuitive user experience
Integrated dynamic content and admin panel functionalities using CodeIgniter
Developed reusable components for easy content updates
Handled backend routing and data display with MVC architecture in CodeIgniter
Ensured mobile responsiveness and performance optimization
features: Dynamic multi-page site developed using PHP CodeIgniter framework
Admin panel for easy content management of academics, admission, and gallery sections
Responsive design with clear navigation and structure
Custom sections for Chairman’s message, vision, faculty, and facilities
Optimized images and content loading for performance

title: RIA Capital LLC
description: RIA Capital LLC is a real estate and interior design firm offering comprehensive turnkey services for residential and commercial projects in the USA and UAE. I developed the frontend for this modern, visually appealing website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, showcasing their premium services, design aesthetics, and commitment to innovation through AI technology.

title: Karunalayam Attingal
tagline: Prayers and Support When You Need It Most
description: Karunalayam Attingal is a nonprofit organization website developed using WordPress. It highlights the organization's mission to provide emotional and spiritual support, especially to the elderly and underprivileged. The website includes clear navigation, donation integration, and an emotional visual appeal to connect with visitors.

title: Hello Nariyal – The Best Coconut Climbers
tagline: Trained Climbers for Safe and Efficient Coconut Harvesting
description: Hello Nariyal is a service-based WordPress website aimed at offering professional coconut tree climbers for regular harvesting and plant protection operations. The site is designed to present the organization’s mission, services, and impact through a clean and engaging layout that includes video content, contact details, and informative sections.

title: Wattsun International – Abroad Education Experts
description: Wattsun International is a dedicated vertical of Wattsun that offers a wide portfolio of abroad education opportunities. It connects students with prestigious universities across the UK, USA, Australia, Canada, Germany, and New Zealand. The focus lies in providing value-driven education solutions that save time and money for candidates.The organization also provides higher education programs tailored for working professionals in fields such as HR, Marketing, and Engineering. With a deep emphasis on career guidance, counselling, and personalized support, Wattsun International ensures that students navigate every stage of their journey abroad—from admission to arrival in their dream country—with confidence and clarity.
role: Developed the WordPress site to represent the services of Wattsun International
Structured pages like Home, About Us,Services, Gallery, Events, Career, and Contact Us
Implemented responsive design for better mobile experience
Configured contact details and action buttons for user convenience
features: Study abroad program listings
Counselling service overview
Professional development course offerings
SEO-optimized WordPress design

title: Salman Binsaleh Steel Products Company
description:
Salman Binsaleh Steel Products Company is a 100% Saudi-owned industrial firm established in 1996 by Mr. Salman H. Binsaleh. The company has a proven track record of 15+ years in delivering engineering and technical services across Oil Field, Steel, Rubber, Petrochemicals, Cement, and the Pipe Industry sectors.

Their services span Projects & Maintenance, Fabrication & Machining, Re-engineering, Industrial Trading, and Maintenance Support across the Middle East. The platform showcases the company's credibility, management team, certifications, and industry-focused service offerings.
role: Designed and developed the complete website using CodeIgniter.
Responsible for frontend UI design, backend integration, content management, and deployment.
features: About and History section
Service categorization and details
Chairman and management info
Certifications & appreciations showcase
Dynamic content loading with CodeIgniter
Responsive UI with Bootstrap
Contact form integration

title: Teams Abroad Pvt Ltd
description:
Teams Abroad is a leading brand in study abroad facilitation services in India, known for its trust, quality, friendliness, and professional approach. The platform aims to make top-quality overseas education services available to aspiring students, helping them fulfill their career dreams abroad.

With a strong mission to empower students beyond national boundaries and a vision to lead in international education services, Teams Abroad offers assistance in university search, application guidance, and test preparation through its extensive network of educational partnerships.
role: Customized WordPress theme to reflect the brand's mission and vision.
Designed and developed About, Services, and Contact pages with responsive layout.
Integrated multimedia, dropdown menus, and clean navigation for a smooth user experience.
features: About page with company values, mission, and vision
Dropdown navigation for Study Abroad, Services, and Test Prep
Contact form with location and inquiry details
Clean and responsive layout for desktop and mobile users
Visual elements and professional imagery

title: Sabarigiri Multispeciality Hospital
description:
Sabarigiri Multispeciality Hospital was established in 1960 by Dr. VK Jayakumar, a visionary in the field of medicine. With a mission to provide affordable, accessible, and quality healthcare, the hospital has grown from a small clinic into a comprehensive healthcare institution in Anchal town. It blends modern medical technology with a compassionate approach to deliver exceptional care across a wide range of specialities.

The website features the hospital's history, services, and mission, showcasing its commitment to holistic healthcare, including prevention, education, early detection, and treatment.
role: Customized the WordPress theme for the hospital’s branding and content.
Developed and styled About Us and Services pages with responsive layout.
Integrated multimedia elements and optimized the user experience for healthcare visitors.
features: Detailed About Us section with hospital history
Responsive design for all devices
Multimedia integration (images, banners)
Searchable services and facilities
Contact page with location and communication options
